body:
/kind bug

**What happened**:

I ran kubelet from HEAD and tried to make a normal cluster using kubeadm. I saw errors like these in the kubelet's log:

(I think [this line](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/api/validation/validation.go#L996) is the cause)

```
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: E0910 13:12:00.450692   22300 runtime.go:66] Observed a panic: "invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference" (runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference)
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:72
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:65
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/runtime/runtime.go:51
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e9f728bbd90b3fba632eb31b20e1dacd/external/go1_8_3_linux_amd64/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:514
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e9f728bbd90b3fba632eb31b20e1dacd/external/go1_8_3_linux_amd64/src/runtime/panic.go:489
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e9f728bbd90b3fba632eb31b20e1dacd/external/go1_8_3_linux_amd64/src/runtime/panic.go:63
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e9f728bbd90b3fba632eb31b20e1dacd/external/go1_8_3_linux_amd64/src/runtime/signal_unix.go:290
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/api/validation/validation.go:996
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/api/validation/validation.go:631
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/api/validation/validation.go:406
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/api/validation/validation.go:364
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/api/validation/validation.go:2482
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/api/validation/validation.go:2448
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/kubelet/config/config.go:334
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/kubelet/config/config.go:232
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/kubelet/config/config.go:287
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/kubelet/config/config.go:159
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/util/config/config.go:83
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: pkg/util/config/config.go:77
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:133
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:134
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: vendor/k8s.io/apimachinery/pkg/util/wait/wait.go:88
syys 10 13:12:00 THEGOPHER kubeletHEAD[22300]: /root/.cache/bazel/_bazel_root/e9f728bbd90b3fba632eb31b20e1dacd/external/go1_8_3_linux_amd64/src/runtime/asm_amd64.s:2197
```

**What you expected to happen**:

No panic

**How to reproduce it (as minimally and precisely as possible)**:

1. Install kubeadm the normal way
2. Download kubelet, kubeadm from CI HEAD and `kubeadm init` a cluster like normal
3. kubelet crashes

Seems related to https://github.com/kubernetes/features/issues/376
@kubernetes/sig-storage-bugs @kubernetes/sig-node-bugs

title: kubelet built from master panics: "invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference"
